entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 14 April 2023
